import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {DataServiceService} from "../../services/data-service.service"; import {IFilm} from "../../models/film"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-films', templateUrl: './films.component.html', styleUrls: ['./films.component.css'] }) export class FilmsComponent implements OnInit { films: IFilm[] = []; searchText =''; constructor(private dataService: DataServiceService,private router:Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.dataService.getFilms().subscribe((films) => { this.films = films }); } }
